articles.title: BYU falls 34-7 to Texas Tech in Big 12 championship game - Deseret News
articles.description: The Cougars fell 34-7 to the favored Red Raiders.
articles.content:
ARLINGTON, Texas There will be no upset in this years Big 12 championship game.
The favored, No. 4-ranked Texas Tech Red Raiders handled BYU 34-7 Saturday at AT&T Stadium in Arlington to capture… [+762 chars]

articles.title: The tech world is sleeping on the most exciting Bluetooth feature in years - The Verge
articles.description: Auracast lets many devices tune into one Bluetooth broadcast. It’s great for accessibility and noisy environments. Why don’t more companies talk about it?

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Rare set of varied factors triggered Black Death - Ars Technica
articles.description: Volcanic eruptions in the mid-1340s triggered a chain of events that brought the Black Death to Europe.
